subtitleNullable: Datasets for anime lovers to make their NLP based anime projects
descriptionNullable:
This dataset has been used to make famous Anime Recommender System ---> [Anime Odyssey](https://animeodysseyy.streamlit.app).

This dataset is mainly useful for NLP based projects. Hope it will help you in your future projects. 😃
